page.name: Bandit Trap
page.description: We are going to get ourselves some bandits.  The knights will corner them, you take them out.  We get information.

properties.name: Bandit Trap
properties.description: We are going to get ourselves some bandits.  The knights will corner them, you take them out.  We get information.
properties.complete: They will think twice before going after an obvious trap...maybe.  Bandits are not the smartest of folks.
